name: Lightberry Fields: A Tiny Town Saga
name_original: Lightberry Fields: A Tiny Town Saga
description:
Lightberry Fields is a casual game in which you play as a mysterious merchant. Your goal is to craft potions and complete quests.  

A tutorial is provided within the game menu. 

 Disclaimer: Currently there is no possibility to save the game. Once you exit your progress will be lost.
